attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign this petition to have the 2012 Olympic logo/brand changed. This has to be something we as a nation should be proud to display not be embarrassed by. To add insult to injury it apparently will or has cost £400,000 there’s something very wrong about this, there’s probably 100’s if not 1000’s of talented aspiring artists/designers who would have been proud to put their name to the concept of such a project for free. Please lets have a logo that we can be proud of.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
